AT.name: Mappy-Land
AT.description: Mappy-Land ist das ursprünglich exklusiv für NES erschienenen Sequel des Arcade-Klassikers, in dem Mappy die Maus Geschenke für seine neue Familie sammeln muss, während er den Mewkies aus dem Weg geht, die ihn aufhalten wollen. Mappy muss acht thematisch unterschiedliche Welten, vom Wilden Westen bis zur Geisterstadt, durchqueren, und dabei Geschenke für seine Verlobte Mapico oder Baseballs für seinen Sohn Junior sammeln. Jede Welt stellt dich vor einzigartige Herausforderungen, denen du begegnen musst, während du den oftmals gut versteckten Ausgang suchst. Zum Glück beherrschst du ebenso clevere Methoden, um es den Mewkies so richtig zu zeigen! Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Mappy-Land
AU.description: Mappy-Land is the NES-exclusive sequel to the classic arcade game, starring Mappy the mouse, who this time must gather gifts for his new family while avoiding the Mewkies who are out to stop him. Mappy must traverse eight themed worlds – from Wild West to Ghost Town – collecting gifts like rings for his fiancée Mapico, or baseballs for his son Junior. Each world has different challenges, as you work out the – often secret – ways to get through. Fortunately, there are also clever ways to combat the antics of the Mewkies! This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Mappy-Land
BG.description: Mappy-Land is the NES-exclusive sequel to the classic arcade game, starring Mappy the mouse, who this time must gather gifts for his new family while avoiding the Mewkies who are out to stop him. Mappy must traverse eight themed worlds – from Wild West to Ghost Town – collecting gifts like rings for his fiancée Mapico, or baseballs for his son Junior. Each world has different challenges, as you work out the – often secret – ways to get through. Fortunately, there are also clever ways to combat the antics of the Mewkies! This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Mappy-Land
BE.description: Mappy-Land, une exclusivité NES, est la suite du jeu d'arcade original. Mappy, la souris, doit ramasser des cadeaux pour sa nouvelle famille, tout en évitant les Mewkies qui tentent de l'arrêter. Mappy doit parcourir huit mondes, en passant du Western à la Ville fantôme, et ramasser des cadeaux tels que des bagues pour sa fiancée Mapico ou encore des balles de base-ball pour son fils Junior. Les défis sont différents selon les mondes, essayez de trouver la sortie... Mais fort heureusement, il existe aussi d'autres façons de combattre ces drôles de Mewkies ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

ES.name: Mappy-Land
ES.description: Mappy-Land es la continuación exclusiva para NES de este clásico de arcade. En esta ocasión, Mappy el ratón tiene la misión de reunir regalos para su nueva familia, pero los Mewkies no se lo van a poner nada fácil. Nuestro protagonista debe atravesar ocho mundos temáticos, como el Salvaje Oeste o el Pueblo Fantasma, e ir recogiendo regalos como, por ejemplo, anillos para su prometida Mapico y pelotas de béisbol para su hijo Junior. En cada mundo, Mappy tendrá que hacer frente a una serie de desafíos únicos para encontrar la salida, que suele estar oculta. ¡Menos mal que también existen métodos ingeniosos para acabar con las travesuras de los Mewkies! Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: Mappy-Land
IT.description: Il nostro topo leggendario torna in Mappy-Land, il seguito del classico da sala giochi in esclusiva per NES. Questa volta Mappy dovrà darsi da fare per raccogliere regali per la sua nuova famiglia, evitando i pestiferi Mewkie che faranno di tutto per fermarlo. Mappy dovrà attraversare otto livelli, ciascuno con un tema speciale: dal selvaggio West, al villaggio fantasma. Aiutalo a recuperare tanti doni per i suoi cari, come gli anelli per la sua fidanzata Mapico o le palle da baseball per il piccolo Junior. In ogni mondo affronterai sfide diverse per scovare la misteriosa via d'uscita. Per fortuna ci sono anche dei metodi ingegnosi per aggirare le angherie dei Mewkie! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

NL.name: Mappy-Land
NL.description: Mappy-Land is het voor de NES exclusieve vervolg op de speelhalklassieker. De hoofdrol is weggelegd voor de muis Mappy die cadeautjes voor zijn nieuwe familieleden moet verzamelen. De Mewkies zijn hier echter niet van gediend en doen er alles aan om roet in het eten te gooien. Loods Mappy door acht werelden, elk met een thema zoals het wilde westen en een spookstad. Verzamel cadeautjes, zoals een ring voor zijn verloofde Mapico en honkballen voor zijn zoon Junior. Elke wereld kent verschillende uitdagingen, al dan niet verborgen paden en vervelende Mewkies die je op allerlei manieren kan verslaan. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Mappy-Land
NZ.description: Mappy-Land is the NES-exclusive sequel to the classic arcade game, starring Mappy the mouse, who this time must gather gifts for his new family while avoiding the Mewkies who are out to stop him. Mappy must traverse eight themed worlds – from Wild West to Ghost Town – collecting gifts like rings for his fiancée Mapico, or baseballs for his son Junior. Each world has different challenges, as you work out the – often secret – ways to get through. Fortunately, there are also clever ways to combat the antics of the Mewkies! PL.name: Mappy-Land
PL.description: Mappy-Land is the NES-exclusive sequel to the classic arcade game, starring Mappy the mouse, who this time must gather gifts for his new family while avoiding the Mewkies who are out to stop him. Mappy must traverse eight themed worlds – from Wild West to Ghost Town – collecting gifts like rings for his fiancée Mapico, or baseballs for his son Junior. Each world has different challenges, as you work out the – often secret – ways to get through. Fortunately, there are also clever ways to combat the antics of the Mewkies! This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Mappy-Land
PT.description: Mappy-Land é a sequela exclusiva para a NES do original clássico de arcada protagonizado por Mappy, o ratinho polícia. Desta vez ele tem de recolher presentes para a sua nova família enquanto tenta escapar-se às garras dos Mewkies. Mappy tem de percorrer oito mundos temáticos, desde Wild West a Ghost Town, para recolher presentes, tais como anéis para a sua noiva ou bolas de basebol para o seu filho Junior. Enfrenta um desafio diferente em cada mundo, à medida que tentas descobrir as passagens, por vezes secretas. Ainda bem que existem outras formas bem engenhosas de escapar às travessuras dos Mewkies! Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Mappy-Land
RU.description: Mappy-Land — это продолжение классической аркады с мышонком-полицейским Mappy в главной роли эксклюзивно для NES. На этот раз он должен собрать как можно больше подарков для своего нового семейства, избегая при этом столкновения с кошачьей бандой Mewkies, которая уж точно попытается помешать ему. Mappy предстоит преодолеть восемь тематических миров — от Дикого Запада (Wild west) до Города привидений (Ghost Town) — и отыскать такие ценные подарки, как кольца для его невесты Mapico или бейсбольные мячи для сына Junior. В каждом из миров мышонка ожидает множество испытаний и секретных дорог, найти которые будет совсем непросто. К счастью, у Mappy в запасе есть несколько трюков, и с вашей помощью он сможет справиться с хулиганами Mewkies! Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

SE.name: Mappy-Land
SE.description: Mappy-Land is the NES-exclusive sequel to the classic arcade game, starring Mappy the mouse, who this time must gather gifts for his new family while avoiding the Mewkies who are out to stop him. Mappy must traverse eight themed worlds – from Wild West to Ghost Town – collecting gifts like rings for his fiancée Mapico, or baseballs for his son Junior.
